content: The National Guochuan Science Museum is a comprehensive science museum. From humanities and social sciences to scientific research of plants and animals, there are dabbles, and there are introductions of bionic technology. Children especially like it. There are slightly obstacles in text reading, but it does not affect ～
It's a great place to visit with your child.The infant experience hall is required to book in advance!
A great place to visit with your baby! There is also an outdoor playground and a baby experience hall for infants.
It was so informative and enjoyable place
There are a lot to experience with children. You can also hear the explanation of constellations in the Astronomical Observatory.

It is a tourist attraction near the house. It takes about 20 minutes from the house. It is beautiful in every season. If it is the season of cherry blossoms here, it will be very beautiful and refreshing.
Amazing park, but sadly i visited it in the winter season. It has a great atmosphere and i know for sure that i will visit it again soon.

Incheon Grand Park is an urban nature park located in Jangsu-dong, Namdong-gu, Incheon.The park is surrounded by Gwanmosan Mountain and Sangasan Mountain.Spanning across 727 acres of land, Incheon Grand Park is the only large-scale natural green park in Incheon.The park provides a pleasant atmosphere for citizens to escape from the city life and enjoy the natural surroundings.Over 4 million people visit the park every year to take in the clean air and relax in nature.

The park is a good place for leisure. Many citizens like to run there. The traffic is very convenient. The environment of the park is beautiful and clean. There are many fitness facilities, tennis courts, badminton courts, basketball courts, and the green road for cycling. The natural ecology is very good and it is very interesting.

Wow, the park is huge. It has a small lake with visible wildlife. Has a small greenhouse for tropical and desert plants. It wpuld have been grander at the peak of its autumn colors. Nonetheless a pleasant visit.
Clean and beautiful Incheon's largest and most beautiful park!!! The car is blocked on weekends, so be sure to take the subway.
Incheon Grand Park is a place I've been to often since I was a child, but when I was a child, I didn't know it was pretty, but there are really many spacious and pretty spaces ~ 😘

Ilsan Lake Park is a fantastic place to walk around both at night and during daytime. The air quality is somehow better here than at Seoul. Maybe that’s purely psychological but still.
